title: Crafting bug, skin not unlocked
body:
Hi,
I just encountered a bug while crafting.
I wanted to permanently unlock the Gentleman Cho'Gath skin shard from my skins loot while I was in queue for a game.
I clicked the "Upgrade to skin permenent" button, the skin showed on the right as well as the "Add to loot/Unlock/Add to inventory" button (don't know exactly what it said). Then suddenly the "Accept" (match) dialog popped up and I accepted the match.
After the match I checked for the skin but I don't have it unlocked...
Also, the "Upgrade to skin permanent" button is not available any more from the skin shard and I think I'm missing yellow essence, too (not 100% sure about that).
Please help!
Thanks in advance for your effort!

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! 

Did you check your inventory after logging out and logging back in? If the skin still isn't there, I'd suggest [shooting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to player support. They'll be able to take a look at your account and figure out where this skin's run off to!

i have just gotten the same bug and i have tried to login and logout 2 times now and i havent gotten my 2 skins
by the way i was not in que
Oh no. D: Have you hit up player support?
